## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [credential(email, password)](./auth.emailauthprovider.credential.md) | <code>static</code> | Initialize an [AuthCredential](./auth-types.authcredential.md) using an email and password. |
